mapper.insert: insert into sys_group (name) select #{name} from dual where not exists(select 1 from sys_group where name=#{name})
mapper.select: SELECT id, NAME FROM sys_group WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT g.id, g.NAME, m.id menu_id, m.NAME menu_name, m.url, m.parent_id, m.order_num, a.NAME action_name, a.id action_id, a.url action_url, a.menu_id action_menu_id, a.method FROM sys_group g LEFT JOIN sys_group_menu gm ON g.id = gm.group_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON gm.menu_id = m.id LEFT JOIN sys_group_action ga ON g.id = ga.group_id LEFT JOIN sys_action a ON ga.action_id = a.id WHERE g.id = #{id} ORDER BY m.order_num
